meanings.definition: An aircraft with three sets of wings.
meanings.sent1: The trilpanes soared gracefully through the sky.
meanings.sent2: Many aviation enthusiasts admire the design of trilpanes.
meanings.sent3: The trilpanes decided to have a race to see who could fly the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The trilpanes in the air looked like majestic birds with multiple wings.
meanings.sent5: The trilpanes' unique triple-wing structure made them stand out at the airshow.

meanings.definition: A type of airplane with three wings.
meanings.sent1: During the airshow, the trilpanes performed daring stunts.
meanings.sent2: Pilots trained rigorously to master flying trilpanes.
meanings.sent3: The trilpanes at the airport always caught the attention of curious onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The trilpanes' triple wings gave them an edge in maneuverability.
meanings.sent5: The trilpanes' distinct appearance made them easy to spot in the sky.
